Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Measure Non-Microbial Analyte(s) In Human Clinical Specimens To Aid In Assessment Of Patients With Suspected Sepsis
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for TriVerity genetic molecular test using qRT-LAMP on the Myrna instrument for host response transcript profiling to aid in differentiation of bacterial, viral, and non-infectious illness and prediction of illness severity in suspected sepsis.
Indications for Use Summary: Automated in vitro diagnostic test measuring host response gene expression from RNA isolated from whole blood in PAXgene Blood RNA tube via RT-LAMP on the Myrna instrument, used in conjunction with clinical assessment to differentiate bacterial, viral, and non-infectious illness and to predict 7-day need for mechanical ventilation, vasopressors, and/or renal replacement therapy in adults presenting to the emergency department with suspected acute infection or sepsis.
